Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_NAOMI>
The owner of the antique shop is quite the
heartthrob. I should come back again to see h--
I-I mean, to buy something! Yeah, commerce!

<NAME_MOB_NAOMI>
I just came to see antiques, but wound up
seriously breaking the bank...

<NAME_MOB_NAOMI>
The thing I was looking for was sold out, but
what I got instead was almost as good!

<NAME_MOB_NAOMI>
I bought exactly what I've been looking for! I
can't tell you how satisfied I feel right now.

<NAME_MOB_NAOMI>
I came to see what products were being traded
here. Sure hope I can walk away with something
good in my bag!

<NAME_MOB_NAOMI>
The person in charge, Veronica... She's just
plain awesome, isn't she?
